EmailTemplate.name: 201703_EMEAI_EASA_STC_Summary_DMLU(W)_2_SIW.201703_EMEAI_EASA_STC_Readiness
EmailTemplate.subject: EASA Readiness Summary - March 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Partner,
We are delighted to announce the availability of an EASA Readiness Summary for the following equipment.
Equipment: Data Loader Management Unit-Wireless (DLMU-W, Phase1), P/N G7229-001 or -002. Replacement of DMU2, DMU3 and DLMU loaders
Platforms in Scope: Falcon7X (EASy), Falcon 900 (EASy), Falcon 2000 (EASy), Gulfstream G550, Gulfstream G450, Agusta 139
Honeywell contact:
Mark Tritten: Mark.Tritten@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Mark.Tritten@Honeywell.com]]>
The purpose of this document is to summarize the technical and certification information to support development of Supplemental Type Certificates (STC) for the Honeywell DLMU-W system. It is intended to provide High-Level System Description, Installation and Certification considerations for the Honeywell RMU system.
The DLMU-W is a drop-in replacement for previous Data Management Unit (DMU) and Data LAN Management Unit (DLMU) data loaders offered by Honeywell. It provides secure wireless connectivity (embedded 802.11b/g/n wireless (Wi-Fi) technology) to the Primus Epic cockpit, enabling wireless database loading and a gateway for mobile apps.
Download a copy of the EASA Readiness Summary:
CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/ERS-00000003_r003_DLMU-W_EASA_Readiness_Summary.pdf]]>
